channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Embarrassing!!!, 10th June
item.description:
Every year this is reported and every year nothing is done! It’s embarrassing!!!

item.title: Rats in gardens, 10th June

item.title: Litter scattered regularly, 10th June
item.description:
Bags of rubbish are regularly left next to the bins, and foxes often tear them open, leaving litter scattered across the road and pavement. please provide a long-term solution.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rope Street, Rotherhithe, London

item.title: Litter everywhere, 10th June

item.title: Unsociable graffiti, 10th June
item.description:
There is unsociable graffiti on a metal box on the side of a road. It’s on a public walkway. Please can someone remove this as soon as possible.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kynaston Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Why is someone allowed to have a garden on pavement, 10th June
item.description:
There is an unsightly attempt at a garden on the pavement it’s been there for ages but I don’t understand why this is allowed this is essentially the property of Southwark council not this property they have a garden on the river side why are they allowed to do this

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 392, Rotherhithe Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large flatscreen TV has been dumped, 10th June
